tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Rohan is a very friendly person and a very learned *** ************* ******* His charges are also very pocket friendly and he makes you feel very comfortable before, during and post the treatment. I would highly recommend going to him for your dental care.

tags: None
review: Dr. Rohan is kind, knowledgeable, and does his best to truly care for the patient as a whole. I had some work I needed done before the end of the year, and he moved around his whole schedule just so I could make the deadline. He even explained to me very clearly all the problems with my jaw and how I can prevent future problems from getting worse. He takes his time and makes you feel right at home. And this is coming from someone who hates going to the dentist and has very sensitive teeth. He gives Professional advice, incredibly friendly staff, clean facilities... nothing about which to complain at all. They're very prompt, very thorough, and very cordial. Easily one of the more efficient and helpful clinic I've attended.He was extremely attentive to my needs, asked me questions just to get to know me versus only focusing on my dental needs (he asked a series of questions to understand what kind of headaches I was having when I mentioned I have them frequently). His explanations are thoughtful, he wants you to leave understanding everything that's happened and what needs to happen next. I'll definitely be going back!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My brother and his family always come to Dr Rohan Patni for their teeth problems and are very happy with his skill and professionalism. Based on their recommendations I decided to see you. I must confess that I was totally nervous but I had to get the implant done so I booked  an appointment  but was hesitant /reluctant about showing up. When I sat on the chair I was literally shivering but in no time your patience n tolerance made me feel comfortable and relaxed. The whole experience before and after the procedure was  very smooth n positive. It was painless no swelling or heavy bleeding n it healed fast. I am lucky to be one of your patient. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. Wishing u the best always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He explained the process well and gave alternative as well . No there doctor would explain things in detail like he did

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I would like to express my sincere appreciation to Dr. Rohan for the exceptional care and professionalism demonstrated during my recent dental treatment at Manasi PolyClinic. His expertise and approach made the entire experience extremely positive. Thank you for providing outstanding service!

Best regards,
Alesh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ***I Highly recommend Dr. Rohan he's amazing!*** I had visited him to get an implant and it was a blissful experience. I dint feel a thing and he got it all done pretty quick aswell. Also if you any questions regarding the work hes doing for u, feel free to ask and he will happily explain everything in detail, he is super nice and friendly aswell! He will provide you with the best solution to your teeth issues. I knw i Will always be goin to him for any of my teeth issues In the future!(I'm sure you'll feel the same!)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I know Dr. Rohan Patani since my junior college days. I came across my wisdom tooth being decayed black causing issues to the canal nerves resulting in pain. I quickly remembered him being a dentist and with dedication he brings. Then finally fixed a appointment and he did his best to fix the wisdom tooth without extraction and performing RC the best way. He also helped to fill few tooth's with decay. His friendly approach and value for treatment gave me much assurance and confidence. Thanks a lot Dr. Rohan Patani.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Treatment done with gentle hands without any pain and problem solved to satisfaction. Doctor is soft spoken

review: Due to my husband's prior bad experience i was very skeptical about implants but dr rohan has worked beyond my expectation and that fear is completely out of my mind. Not only during the treatment but he is always approachable after the treatment as well. Any questions asked after the treatment were also answered to my satisfaction. And the charges for the whole treatment were also very reasonable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a capped tooth which fell off just a day before an important work presentation. Dr. Rohan helped immensely. He was available on short notice (on a holiday) and helped reattach and later replace with a new cap. I am usually very afraid of dentists, but Dr. Rohan was very patient, explained everything he was doing and ensured that there was absolutely no discomfort at all. Highly recommend this doctor is you are looking for a good dentist.
reply_text:

I am always happy to help those in need.

review: Dr. Rohan is the 3rd dentist I visited in last 6 months. My experience with the previous 2 dentists was not very helpful so I was not expecting much out of this visit. But I must say this visit turned out to b a fruitful one coz I m now free from my dental nightmare. He not only treated the earlier messed up root canal treated teeth which was having pain but also gave me lots of tips and tricks to keep my teeth healthy. I also visited his Facebook page where I further got a lot more tips to help with my dental hygiene. I would definitely recommend everyone to visit him for regular checkup and also visit his fb page.

The outcome was superb and value for the moolah expended. Dr Rohan is recommended for anyone with a dental problem seeking a sound solution.

review: I had severe pain in my tooth. Dr. Rohan immediately relieved it by immediate action. He treated it immediately and my tooth was absolutely pain free after root canal. He also gave me a very natural lookin cap over it. As it was a front tooth I couldn't go out with a bad smile so he prepared a temporary cap for me in a few mins. Have to add the root canal treatment was completely pain free. I m really thankful to Dr. Rohan. Finally I have a reliable and good dentist.
